metadata.title: CVE-2023-32181 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A Buffer Copy without Checking Size of Input ('Classic Buffer Overflow')vulnerability in openSUSE libeconf allows for DoS via malformedconfiguration files This issue affects libeconf: before 0.5.2.

criterions.comment: libeconf package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
